query: SELECT c.*, (select count(*) FROM facture f where f."clientCode" = c."code") as "nombreDeFactures",
(select sum("nombreDePoints") FROM facture f where f."clientCode" = c."code") as "nombreTotalDePoints"

adresses.query: SELECT a.* FROM client_adresse a WHERE a."clientCode" = '${code}'

factures.query: SELECT f.* FROM facture f WHERE f."clientCode" = '${code}' and f."dateCommande" >= cast(coalesce(nullif('${dateCommandeMin}', ''), '1970-01-01') as date)

query: a."code" as "article__code", a."libelle" as "article__libelle", a."prix" as "article__prix"
FROM ligne_facture l JOIN article a ON l."articleCode" = a."code"
